/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the gray, cloudy sky above. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are muted, with the green of the trees and the gray of the sky dominating the palette.
